net.jforum.util

Class I18n

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.util.I18n

  • public class I18n
extends Object
    I18n (Internationalization) class implementation. Does nothing of special, just loads the messages into memory and provides a static method to acess them.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil, James Yong

      • changeBoardDefault

        public static void changeBoardDefault(String newDefaultLanguage)

      • load

        public static void load(String localeName)
        Loads a new locale. If localeName is either null or empty, or if the locale is already loaded, the method will return without executing any code.
        Parameters:
        localeName - The locale name to load

      • reset

        public static void reset()

      • getMessage

        public static String getMessage(String localeName,
                String messageName,
                Object[] params)
        Gets a I18N (internationalized) message.
        Parameters:
        localeName - The locale name to retrieve the messages from
        messageName - The message name to retrieve. Must be a valid entry into the file specified by i18n.file property.
        params - Parameters needed by some messages. The messages with extra parameters are formated according to MessageFormatspecification
        Returns:
        String With the message

      • getMessage

        public static String getMessage(String messageName,
                Object[] params)
        Parameters:
        messageName - String
        params - Object
        Returns:
        String
        See Also:
        getMessage(String, String, Object[])

        public static String getMessage(String localeName,

        Gets an I18N (internationalization) message.
        Parameters:
        m - The message name to retrieve. Must be a valid entry into the file specified by i18n.file property.
        localeName - String
        Returns:
        String With the message

      • getUserLanguage

        public static String getUserLanguage()
        Gets the language name for the current request. The method will first look at UserSession.getLang() and use it if any value is found. Otherwise, the default board language will be used
        Returns:
        String

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(String language)
        Check whether the language is loaded in i18n.
        Parameters:
        language - String
        Returns:
        boolean

      • languageExists

        public static boolean languageExists(String language)
        Check if the given language exist.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to check
        Returns:
        true if the language is a valid and registered translation.
